授業方法:
【感染防止重点期間】
3回目以降「Zoom による同時双方向」で配信する。授業開始 5 分前までに Zoom へ入っておくこと(Zoom URLはLUNAのお知らせを確認してください。) 2回目までは対面授業を継続する。 This course includes several COIL (collaborative online international learning) sessions in which the KG students will engage in interactions and group activities/projects virtually with university students in another country.
In non-COIL components, the KG students will mainly engage in Learning Through Discussion (LTD) based on weekly reading material.

第3回: English as a lingua franca and transcultural communication
第4回: A casual virtual meeting with students overseas
第5回: Creating and posting a personal introduction video
第6回: The initial meeting, team building and group activity (COIL)
第10回: Pre-COIL briefing session on social systems in Japan
第12回: Social studies and education systems of Japan/overseas (COIL)
第13回: Review and debriefing the COIL experience
第14回: Presentation of the final assignment (TBC: oral presentation or written essay)
トピック.授業外学習2:
Various weekly assignments will be given.
●Read/watch the given material and prepare for group discussion. (Students will be expected to show their thorough understanding of each material.)
●During the COIL component, students will participate in group work outside of class hours.
●Taking the Intercultural Effectiveness Scale (IES) pre-test (tentative)
●Taking the IES post-test (tentative)
